sections: Good things are happening! The US Postal Service and the City of Los Angeles are exploring setting up public financial institutions as an alternative to their private predatory counterparts. Financial officials around the world are closing in on a deal to set a global minimum tax rate, in order to stop the evasive tax  practices of the world’s superrich. And the movement towards literary equity continues, as New York city libraries end all late fees.
Biden restores protections for a sacred landscape in Utah.
A new vaccine could save tens of thousands of children’s lives each year.
